What is HackwithIndiaa?

HackwithIndiaa is India's most anticipated live web hacking event, bringing together ethical hackers, security researchers, and tech enthusiasts from across the nation. Experience real-time hacking challenges with live web targets in a controlled online environment.

Live Web Hacking

Participate in real-time web application hacking challenges with live targets and instant scoring.

Real Vulnerabilities

Discover and exploit actual security flaws in web applications under controlled environments.

Network & Learn

Connect with Indiaa's top security researchers, industry experts, and fellow enthusiasts.

100% Free Entry

Participate in the event completely free of cost. No registration fees, no hidden charges.
